channel.title: Online DAF App
channel.description: Free online Delayed Auditory Feedback (DAF) app to improve speech fluency and reduce stuttering. Works instantly in your browser with adjustable delay settings.

item.title: Online DAF App
item.description: Delayed Auditory Feedback (DAF) Online App for Speech Fluency is a free, browser-based app designed to help improve speech fluency and reduce stuttering.
